name: Full Speed Crazy Car Racing
description:
This mini car racing game is a fun physic race car games for kids and adults. The goal is simple, race, climb hills and collect money on your way. If you're looking for a free car racing games for kids under 10 or a girl car racing games, look no further, this new climb racing will make you happy! But you need to be careful when you do some free extreme car driving. If you go too fast, the car will flip and will explode! Release the Mcqueen in you and race as far as you can!

Do your kids like to play with trucks or cars? This fun car games for kids is an extreme car driving experience. Simple touch controls makes the game easy enough to play for toddlers and preschool children.

This game is also a truck racing game. The game include 3 cars and 1 truck. You just need to collect coins to buy the vehicles. With this free car games race for kids, you get to master your car jumping and car crashing skill.

Easy one touch game. It’s also a truck racing games for boys and girls. Let your kids feel the rush of collecting more coins! So, are you ready to race in this cool car racing games?

Features in this car games for kids:
- FREE to play
- Buy a new car or truck with your coins and try to go as far as you can and beat your score!
- Cool cars and trucks graphics and audio track
- Easy controls, even for kids
- Awesome 2d physics
- Support HD tablets and Phones

If your kids enjoys cars and trucks, then this game is the perfect fit. This game is one of the best car games in the world!

In the next update, we will also include a new variety of motorcycles, trucks, police cars and more! Monster truck games for kids is also on it's way!
